actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to give the Food and Drug Administration greater discretion in the control of food additives.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit the Secretary of Health and Human Services from establishing a regulation for the use of a food additive unless such additive is found to induce cancer when ingested in reasonable quantities by man or animal.

titles.title: A bill to give the Food and Drug Administration greater discretion in the control of food additives.
